title: How many hours of video is 58 terabytes? - Quora

response.answer_text: This could be 1 sec to your whole life. The size of a video depends upon its resolution, colors, compression, etc.According to my calculations, 1080p and H.264 compression, 59,392 hours of video in 58 teratytes, approximately, 118,784 hours for 720p H.264 compression, and 14,848 hours in a 4K video.
It depends on the resolution and compression codec used in the video. A similar question has been asked and answered here on Quora: How many hours of video can I fit into a 1 terabyte HDD?.
